#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
int main()
{
	int t,i,n;
	char inp[250], map[26],out[250];
	char map_back[26];
	scanf("%d\n",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%d",&n);
		gets(inp);
		gets(map);
		for(i=0;i<26;i++)
		{
			map_back[i]=map[i];
			//printf("%c %c\n",('A'+i),map[i]);
		}	
		for(i=0;i<=strlen(inp);i++)
		{
			if(inp[i]>='A' && inp[i]<='Z')
				out[i]=map_back[inp[i]-'A'];
		
			else
				out[i]=inp[i];
		}
		//out[strlen(inp)]=inp[strlen(inp)];
		printf("%s\n",out);
	}
	return 0;
}
